title: Basil’s visit to India postponed
content: Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa’s visit to India has been postponed, Daily Mirror learns.The Minister was supposed to land in New Delhi today for meetings with his Indian counterpart Nirmala Sitharaman and External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankar to finalise on financial cooperation for Sri Lanka, to secure supplies of essential foods and fuel in the midst of the foreign exchange crisis.
